::: {.content-container}
## InVEST: Schistosomiasis Plugin

A tool within the InVEST software for incorporating disease considerations in Environmental Impact Assessments. 
:::

:::{.banner .banner-1}
::: {.banner-content}
::: {.banner-image}
![](images/invest1.png)
:::

::: {.banner-text}
## Easy to use 
The software accommodates multiple models and allows users to input their own spatial raster datasets or use recommended datasets. Tutorials on installation, setup, and use will be provided.   

::: {.centered-links}
<a href="https://naturalcapitalproject.stanford.edu/software/invest/">Learn about InVEST</a>
:::

[The schistosomiasis plugin was built by the De Leo Lab in collaboration with NatCap, but will be hosted independently.]{style="font-size:.7rem; color:#ae5b5b;"}

## Report ready visuals   
The output predictions of schistosomiasis risk can be used in any GIS software. Additionally, we are developing preformed reports to aid users.

## Validation 
We have validated the predictions made by the software with observed infection *Schistosoma haematobium* prevalence data from the Senegal River Basin.
